item.title: Working with nulls in Spark UDFs
item.description: Sometimes the simplest things are hardest to work out. Let’s say I have a DataFrame created from a parquet file which can have nullable columns that are of a certain type - in this example that is Int. The reason I chose Int particularly is that it is not a trivial case i.e. it doesn’t accept nulls as values. The problem that arises is that the DataFrame can have IntegerType specified for the schema and still contain nulls.
